00029 int gcount = 0;

00031 bool process_file(string file_path, ostream& out){
00032 
00033         if(gcount < 1100000){
00034                 gcount ++;
00035                 return false;
00036         }
00037 
00038         path full_path( file_path );
00039         if ( !exists( full_path ) )
00040         {
00041                 cout << "Not-exist error: " << file_path << endl;
00042                 return false;
00043         }
00044         if (  !is_regular_file( full_path ) )
00045         {
00046                 cout << "Non-file error: " << file_path << endl;
00047                 return false;
00048         }
00049 
00050         ifstream ifs(file_path.c_str());
00051 
00052         TermVector termVector;
00053 
00054 
00055         const int buff_size = 200000;
00056         char buff[buff_size];
00057         string text;
00058         while(!ifs.eof()){
00059                 ifs.getline(buff, buff_size);
00060                 string line(buff);
00061                 text.append(line + "\n");
00062         }
00063         ifs.close();
00064 
00065         UString ustring(text,UString::UTF_8);
00066         ustring.toLowerString();
00067         TermList LATerms;
00068         LA.analyze(ustring, LATerms);
00069 
00070         TermList::iterator itList = LATerms.begin();
00071         for(; itList != LATerms.end() ; itList ++)
00072                 termVector.add(itList->textString());
00073 
00074         map<string, int>::const_iterator it = termVector.termFreqMap.begin();
00075         out << "====doc:"<< gcount <<"===="<< endl;
00076         for(; it != termVector.termFreqMap.end(); ++ it){
00077 //              gTermFreq.add(it->first, it->second);
00078 //              gDocFreq.add(it->first);
00079                 out << it->first << "\t" << it->second << endl;
00080         }
00081 
00082         gcount ++;
00083 
00084         return true;
00085 }
00086 bool process_file_stat(string file_path){
00087 
00088         path full_path( file_path );
00089         if ( !exists( full_path ) )
00090         {
00091                 cout << "Not-exist error: " << file_path << endl;
00092                 return false;
00093         }
00094         if (  !is_regular_file( full_path ) )
00095         {
00096                 cout << "Non-file error: " << file_path << endl;
00097                 return false;
00098         }
00099         ifstream ifs(file_path.c_str());
00100         const int buff_size = 2000;
00101         char buff[buff_size];
00102 
00103         int cline = 0;
00104         string ll;
00105         while(!ifs.eof()){
00106                 ifs >> ll;
00107                 cline ++;
00108         }
00109         cout << "#line=" << cline;
00110         boost::progress_display p_display(cline);
00111         ifs.close();
00112         ifs.open(file_path.c_str());
00113         while(!ifs.eof()){
00114                 ifs.getline(buff, buff_size);
00115                 string line(buff);
00116                 if(line.length() == 0 || line.substr(0,8).compare("====doc:") == 0)
00117                         continue;
00118                 int pos = line.find("\t");
00119                 if(pos <= 0)
00120                         continue;
00121                 string term = line.substr(0,pos);
00122                 int freq = atoi(line.substr(pos + 1).c_str());
00123                 gTermFreq.add(term, freq);
00124                 gDocFreq.add(term);
00125                 ++ p_display;
00126         }
00127         ifs.close();
00128         return true;
00129 }

00131 int process_fold_stat( string fold ,string tar_fold)
00132 {
00133 
00134         path full_path( fold ); // absolute directory
00135 
00136         if ( !exists( full_path ) )
00137         {
00138                 cout << "\nNot found: " << full_path.native_file_string() << endl;
00139                 return 1;
00140         }
00141 
00142         if ( is_directory( full_path ) )
00143         {
00144 //              boost::progress_display p_display(21);
00145 
00146                 directory_iterator end_iter;
00147                 directory_iterator dir_itr( full_path );
00148 
00149 //              int count = 0;
00150 
00151                 for ( ; dir_itr != end_iter; ++dir_itr )
00152                 {
00153                         try
00154                         {
00155                                 if ( is_regular_file( dir_itr->status() ) )
00156                                 {
00157                                         cout << fold + "/" + dir_itr->filename() << endl;
00158                                         if( process_file_stat(fold + "/" + dir_itr->filename()) ){
00159 //                                              ++count;
00160 //                                              ++p_display;
00161 //                                              if(count % 500 == 0)
00162 //                                                      cout << gcount << endl;
00163                                         }
00164 
00165 
00166                                 }
00167                         }
00168                         catch ( const std::exception & ex )
00169                         {
00170                                 cout << dir_itr->filename() << " " << ex.what() << std::endl;
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173 
00174                 string target = tar_fold + "/tf.txt";
00175                 ofstream ofs(target.c_str());
00176                 ofs << gTermFreq ;
00177                 ofs.close();
00178 
00179                 target = tar_fold + "/df.txt";
00180                 ofs.open(target.c_str());
00181                 ofs << gDocFreq ;
00182                 ofs.close();
00183 
00184 
00185         }
00186         else // must be a file
00187         {
00188                 cout << "\nFound: " << full_path.native_file_string() << "\n";
00189         }
00190         return 0;
00191 }

00193 int process_fold( string fold ,string tar_fold)
00194 {
00195 //      path full_path( "aaa" , native); // relative directory
00196         path full_path( fold ); // absolute directory
00197 
00198 
00199 
00200         if ( !exists( full_path ) )
00201         {
00202                 cout << "\nNot found: " << full_path.native_file_string() << endl;
00203                 return 1;
00204         }
00205 
00206 
00207 
00208         if ( is_directory( full_path ) )
00209         {
00210                 boost::progress_display p_display(1553841);
00211 
00212                 directory_iterator end_iter;
00213                 directory_iterator dir_itr( full_path );
00214 
00215                 int count = 0;
00216                 ofstream ofs;
00217                 int tar_count = 0;
00218                 string target = tar_fold + "/" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(tar_count) ;
00219                 ofs.open(target.c_str());
00220 
00221                 for ( ; dir_itr != end_iter; ++dir_itr )
00222                 {
00223                         try
00224                         {
00225                                 if ( is_regular_file( dir_itr->status() ) )
00226                                 {
00227                                         if( process_file(fold + "/" + dir_itr->filename(), ofs) ){
00228                                                 ++p_display;
00229                                                 if(gcount % 500 == 0)
00230                                                         cout << gcount << endl;
00231                                                 if(gcount % 50000 == 0){
00232                                                         ofs.close();
00233                                                         tar_count ++;
00234                                                         target = tar_fold + "/" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(tar_count) ;
00235                                                         ofs.open(target.c_str());
00236                                                 }
00237                                         }
00238 
00239 
00240                                 }
00241                         }
00242                         catch ( const std::exception & ex )
00243                         {
00244                                 cout << dir_itr->filename() << " " << ex.what() << std::endl;
00245                         }
00246                 }
00247                 ofs.close();
00248                 cout<< "count = "<< count << endl;
00249         }
00250         else // must be a file
00251         {
00252                 cout << "\nFound: " << full_path.native_file_string() << "\n";
00253         }
00254         return 0;
00255 }

00257 void feature_stat(){
00258         string file = "/disk/data/wiki_txt/df.txt";
00259         string output = "/disk/data/wiki_txt/df_distribution.txt";
00260         string output2 = "/disk/data/wiki_txt/df_log_distribution.txt";
00261         map<int, int> count_map;
00262         map<int, int>::iterator it;
00263 
00264         ifstream ifs(file.c_str());
00265         string line;
00266         int freq;
00267         while(!ifs.eof()){
00268                 ifs >> line;
00269                 line = line.substr(1, line.length() - 2);
00270                 int p1 = line.find(",");
00271                 line = line.substr(p1+1);
00272                 freq = atoi(line.c_str());
00273                 if(freq == 0)
00274                         continue;
00275                 it = count_map.find(freq);
00276 
00277                 if(it == count_map.end())
00278                         count_map[freq] = 1;
00279                 else
00280                         it->second ++;
00281         }
00282 
00283         ifs.close();
00284 
00285         ofstream ofs(output.c_str());
00286         ofstream ofs2(output2.c_str());
00287 
00288         it = count_map.begin();
00289         for(;it != count_map.end(); it ++){
00290                 ofs << it->first << "\t" << it->second << endl ;
00291                 ofs2 << log((double)it->first) << "\t" << log((double)it->second) << endl ;
00292         }
00293 
00294         ofs.close();
00295         ofs2.close();
00296 }
00297 void term_selection(){
00298         string tf_file = "/disk/data/wiki_txt/tf.txt";
00299         string df_file = "/disk/data/wiki_txt/df.txt";
00300         string output = "/disk/data/wiki_txt/voc_15_15.txt";
00301 
00302         ifstream ifs1(tf_file.c_str());
00303         ifstream ifs2(df_file.c_str());
00304         ofstream ofs(output.c_str());
00305 
00306         int  min_tf = 15;
00307         int  min_df = 15;
00308         int tf, df;
00309 
00310         string line1,line2,term;
00311 
00312         double logN = log(1550000.0), TFIDF;
00313         double TFIDF_MIN = 0;
00314 
00315         int count = 0;
00316 
00317         while(!ifs1.eof()){
00318                 ifs1 >> line1;
00319                 ifs2 >> line2;
00320 
00321                 line1 = line1.substr(1, line1.length() - 2);
00322                 line2 = line2.substr(1, line2.length() - 2);
00323 
00324                 int p1 = line1.find(",");
00325                 term = line1.substr(0,p1);
00326                 line1 = line1.substr(p1+1);
00327                 line2 = line2.substr(p1+1);
00328                 tf = atoi(line1.c_str());
00329                 df = atoi(line2.c_str());
00330                 if(!(tf >= min_tf && df >= min_df ))
00331                         continue;
00332 
00333 //              UString ustr(term, UString::CP949);
00334 
00335                 bool is_english = true;
00336 
00337                 for(unsigned int i = 0 ; i< term.length() ; i ++){
00338                         unsigned char c = term[i] & 0x80;
00339                         if(c != 0x00){
00340                                 is_english = false;
00341                                 break;
00342                         }
00343                 }
00344 
00345                 if(!is_english)
00346                         continue;
00347 
00348                 char c = term[0];
00349 
00350                 if(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
00351                         continue;
00352 
00353                 TFIDF = tf * (logN - log((double)df) );
00354 
00355                 if(TFIDF < TFIDF_MIN)
00356                         continue;
00357 
00358 //              ofs << term << "\t" <<tf <<"\t"<<df <<"\t" <<TFIDF << endl;
00359                 ofs << term << endl;
00360                 count ++ ;
00361         }
00362 
00363         cout << "size = " << count << endl;
00364 
00365         ifs1.close();
00366         ifs2.close();
00367         ofs.close();
00368 }

00370 int process_fold_merge( string fold ,string target)
00371 {
00372         path full_path( fold ); // absolute directory
00373         if ( !exists( full_path ) )
00374         {
00375                 cout << "\nNot found: " << full_path.native_file_string() << endl;
00376                 return 1;
00377         }
00378         if ( is_directory( full_path ) )
00379         {
00380                 directory_iterator end_iter;
00381                 directory_iterator dir_itr( full_path );
00382 
00383                 ofstream ofs;
00384 
00385                 ofs.open(target.c_str());
00386 
00387                 const int buff_size = 200000;
00388                 char buff[buff_size];
00389                 string line;
00390                 for (int i = 0 ; i <= 9 ; i ++ )
00391                 {
00392                         try
00393                         {
00394                                 string source = fold + "/" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(i);
00395                                 cout << source << endl;
00396                                 ifstream ifs(source.c_str());
00397                                 while(!ifs.eof()){
00398                                         ifs.getline(buff, buff_size);
00399                                         string line(buff);
00400                                         ofs << line << endl;
00401                                 }
00402                         }
00403                         catch ( const std::exception & ex )
00404                         {
00405                                 cout << dir_itr->filename() << " " << ex.what() << std::endl;
00406                         }
00407                 }
00408                 ofs.close();
00409         }
00410         else // must be a file
00411         {
00412                 cout << "\nFound: " << full_path.native_file_string() << "\n";
00413         }
00414         return 0;
00415 }

00429                 string term(buff);
00430                 if(term.length() == 0)
00431                         continue;

00433                 id ++;
00434         }
00435         ifs.close();

00456         ofstream ofs(output.c_str());
00457

00459         map<int,int>::iterator it_map;

00461         int doc_count = 0;
00462 
00463         ifs.open(wiki_file.c_str());
00464         int line_count = 0;
00465         while(!ifs.eof()){
00466                 ifs.getline(buff, buff_size);
00467                 string term(buff);
00468                 if(term.length() == 0)
00469                         continue;
00470                 //a new document
00471                 if(term.substr(0,8).compare("====doc:") == 0 && line_count != 0){
00472                         int size = tfmap.size();
00473                         if(size > 0){
00474                                 ofs << tfmap.size();
00475                                 it_map = tfmap.begin();
00476                                 for(;it_map != tfmap.end(); ++it_map){
00477                                         ofs << "\t" << it_map->first << ":" << it_map->second;
00478                                 }
00479                                 ofs << endl;
00480                                 tfmap.clear();
00481                                 doc_count ++;
00482                                 if(doc_count % 10000 == 0)
00483                                         cout << doc_count << endl;
00484                                 if(doc_count % 1600000 == 0){
00485                                         ofs.close();
00486                                         fc ++;
00487                                         output = dir + "/" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(fc);
00488                                         ofs.open(output.c_str());
00489                                 }
00490                         }
00491                         continue;
00492                 }

00495

00508                                 exit(-1);

00510 //                      cout << "found!" << endl;

00513 //                      cout << "not found!" << endl;
00514

00517         }
00518

00520         if(size > 0){
00521                 ofs << tfmap.size();
00522                 it_map = tfmap.begin();
00523                 for(;it_map != tfmap.end(); ++it_map)
00524                         ofs << "\t" << it_map->first << ":" << it_map->second << endl;
00525                 ofs << endl;
00526                 ofs.close();
00527         }
00528 
00529         ifs.close();
00530 }

00532 void generate_serialized_corpus(string voc_path, string wiki_file, string target){
00533 
00534         //load dictionary
00535         map<string,int> str2id;
00536         map<string,int>::iterator it;
00537         ifstream ifs(voc_path.c_str());
00538         int id = 0;
00539         const int buff_size = 2000;
00540         char buff[buff_size];
00541         while(!ifs.eof()){
00542                 ifs.getline(buff, buff_size);
00543                 string term(buff);
00544                 if(term.length() == 0)
00545                         continue;
00546                 str2id[term] = id;
00547                 id ++;
00548         }
00549         ifs.close();
00550 
00551         ofstream ofs(target.c_str());
00552         boost::archive::binary_oarchive oa(ofs);
00553 
00554         cout << "size = " << id  << "," << str2id.size() << endl;
00555 
00556         map<int,int>* tfmap = new map<int,int>();
00557 
00558         int doc_count = 0;
00559 
00560         ifs.open(wiki_file.c_str());
00561         int line_count = 0;
00562 
00563         int max_id = 0;
00564 
00565         while(!ifs.eof()){
00566                 ifs.getline(buff, buff_size);
00567                 string term(buff);
00568                 if(term.length() == 0)
00569                         continue;
00570                 //a new document
00571                 if(term.substr(0,8).compare("====doc:") == 0 && line_count != 0){
00572                         int size = tfmap->size();
00573                         if(size > 0)
00574                                 oa << *tfmap;
00575                         delete tfmap;
00576                         tfmap = new map<int,int>();
00577                         doc_count ++;
00578                         if(doc_count % 100000 == 0)
00579                                 cout << doc_count << endl;
00580                         continue;
00581                 }
00582 
00583                 int p = term.find("\t");
00584                 int freq = atoi( term.substr(p+1).c_str() );
00585                 term = term.substr(0,p);
00586                 it = str2id.find(term);
00587                 if(it != str2id.end()){
00588                         id = it->second;
00589                         if(id > max_id)
00590                                 max_id = id;
00591                         (*tfmap)[id] = freq;
00592                 }
00593                 line_count ++;
00594         }
00595         int size = tfmap->size();
00596         if(size > 0)
00597                 oa << *tfmap;
00598         delete tfmap;
00599         tfmap = new map<int,int>();
00600         oa << *tfmap;
00601         delete tfmap;
00602         cout << "max_id=" << max_id << endl;
00603 
00604         ofs.close();
00605         ifs.close();
00606 }
